ðŸ“– Summary: FastAPI-Guard is a security library designed to protect FastAPI applications from various threats. It offers middleware for controlling IP access, logging requests, detecting penetration attempts, and configuring CORS. The library provides features like IP whitelisting/blacklisting, rate limiting, automatic IP banning, and cloud provider IP blocking, enhancing the security posture of FastAPI-based APIs.
